resources.string: Design of a Maturity Checker Device for Coconuts Using Deep Learning
Information about the Design of a Maturity Checker Device for Coconuts Using Deep Learning
The project is a coconut maturity checker device using deep learning. The maturity of the coconut would be based on three criterias which are color, shape, and sound.

- The main objective of the project is to design a device that can detect the maturity of the coconut using deep learning that meets the clientâ€™s needs in compliance with engineering standards and with consideration of the trade-offs based on the identified constraints.
- To design a prototype that can determine the maturity of the coconut;
- To capture the color, shape, and sound from knocking off the coconut; and
- To test and evaluate the accuracy and reliability of the prototype.
